description: From Ancient Greek σημαίνω (sēmaínō, “I signify, I mean”), modelled on morpheme. See also -eme and  Emic unit on  Wikipedia.Wikipedia .

entries.meaning: (linguistics) The smallest unit of meaning; especially, the meaning expressed by a morpheme.
examples: Coordinate terms: chereme, chroneme, grapheme, lexeme, listeme, morpheme, phoneme, taxeme, toneme
